publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4410 Michael McMahon: Supporting the Telecommunications Industry in Lanarkshire and the Rest of Scotland—That the Parliament notes recent merger announcements by companies operating in the telecommunications industry; notes the impact of these mergers in relation to actual and potential reductions in the Lanarkshire workforce especially; encourages the Scottish Executive to work with the industry to develop a strategy for the retention and expansion of telecommunications, telecommunication services and telecommunications customer services jobs in Scotland and to make outsourcing an unattractive option, and calls on the Executive, Scottish Enterprise and the other support agencies to establish contact with telecommunications operators with operations throughout Lanarkshire and the rest of Scotland, including Cable and Wireless, NTL:Telewest, Orange, T-Mobile and O2, to ascertain what support can be offered to encourage the retention and expansion of telecommunications, telecommunication services and telecommunications customer services jobs in both Lanarkshire and the rest of Scotland.

S2M-4410*#* Michael McMahon: Supporting the Telecommunications Industry in Lanarkshire and the Rest of Scotland—That the Parliament notes recent merger announcements by companies operating in the telecommunications industry; notes the impact of these mergers in relation to actual and potential reductions in the Lanarkshire workforce especially; *considers that* the Scottish Executive *should* work with the industry to develop a strategy for the retention and expansion of telecommunications, telecommunication services and telecommunications customer services jobs in Scotland and to make outsourcing an unattractive option, and *believes that* the Executive, Scottish Enterprise and the other support agencies *should* establish contact with telecommunications operators with operations throughout Lanarkshire and the rest of Scotland, including Cable and Wireless, NTL:Telewest, Orange, T-Mobile and O2, to ascertain what support can be offered to encourage the retention and expansion of telecommunications, telecommunication services and telecommunications customer services jobs in both Lanarkshire and the rest of Scotland. Supported by: Alex Neil* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4410# Supporting the Telecommunications Industry in Lanarkshire and the Rest of Scotland (lodged on 16 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
